duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive market research strategies to provide meaningful findings to the business.
Lead the ongoing development and maintenance of analytics tools for rate revisions and product insights.
Use best practices for data management, reporting, and analytics related to the business.
Deliver accurate and meaningful analytical tools to partners enabling effective business decisions.
Report on the performance of analytics tools, providing data-driven insights for continuous improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business related field (i.e. Marketing, Finance, Insurance etc) or equivalent experience required.
